name: Sphere Frustration
description: Sphere Frustration is an arena based item collection game. You must use the surroundings to your advantage, evade the human that is chasing you and collect all the items in an arena.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows - 7 , 8 , 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel Celeron G1840 or Equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: R7 240 1gb or Equivalent Storage: 500 MB available space
